text: The 1959 Honduran Amateur League was the twelfth edition of the Honduran Amateur League. C.D. Olimpia obtained its 3rd national title.RadioHouse.hn – ¿Sabes cuantos títulos ha ganado Olimpia en realidad? – 28 July 2016 The season ran from 1 February 1959 to 16 November 1959.DiarioMas.hn – Los 37 títulos de liga del Olimpia en base a ley – 12 July 2016 ==Regional champions== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Regional championship !! Champions |- | Cortés || Marathón |- | Francisco Morazán || Olimpia |- | Yoro || Honduras |} ===Known results=== ==National championship round== Played in a double round- robin format between the regional champions.
